overview:
Working as a Business Development/Finance Manager

Expertise in handling a diverse range of operations

Proven track record of increasing revenues, establishing networks, streamlining workflow and creating a team work environment to enhance productivity. Specialties:

Strategic Planning, Business Development, Marketing, Client Management & Team Management Sales & customer relationship management in the Financial Services sector & US Staffing with a proven track record of hiring success.

degrees.subject: EMBA
degrees.institution: Indian School Of Management and Studies
